panels.description: The number of message IDs provided in IWANT control messages sent to remote peers.
panels.title: Sent IWANT message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs in IHAVE control messages which have been sent to a remote peer.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(bitmask, le) (rate(blossomsub_ihave_messages_bucket{job=~"$job", instance=~"$host", direction="send"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Sent IHAVE message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs provided in IWANT control messages received from remote peers.
panels.title: Received IWANT message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs in IHAVE control messages which have received from a remote peer.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(bitmask, le) (rate(blossomsub_ihave_messages_bucket{job=~"$job", instance=~"$host", direction="recv"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Received IHAVE message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs provided in IWANT control messages which have not been sent to a remote peer due to an error (usually a full queue).
panels.title: Dropped IWANT message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs in IHAVE control messages which have not been sent to a remote peer due to an error (usually a full queue).

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(bitmask, le) (rate(blossomsub_ihave_messages_bucket{job=~"$job", instance=~"$host", direction="drop"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Dropped IHAVE message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs provided in IDONTWANT control messages sent to remote peers.
panels.title: Sent IDONTWANT message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs provided in IDONTWANT control messages received from remote peers.
panels.title: Received IDONTWANT message count histogram

panels.description: The number of message IDs provided in IDONTWANT control messages which have not been sent to a remote peer due to an error (usually a full queue).
panels.title: Dropped IDONTWANT message count histogram
